column4: Can the user post a message in the world chat successfully?
column5:
1. From the City view, click on the chat bar towards the bottom of the screen.
2. Type a message in the text field.
3. Press the enter key on the keyboard.
column6: The world chat should appear, with "World Chat" highlighted. When pressing Enter, the typed message should appear.

column4: Does the user get notification when a new chat message comes in?
column5:
1. Make sure Player A is in City View.
2. Post a message into the World Chat using Player B.
column6: Player A should receive a flashing animation as the new chat appears.

column4: Can the user post a message in the Alliance chat successfully?
column5:
1. From the City view, click on the chat bar towards the bottom of the screen. 
2. Click on "Alliance Chat" so that it is highlighted.
3. Type a message in the text field. 
4. Press the enter key on the keyboard.
column6: When pressing Enter, the typed message should appear.

column4: Does the user get notification when a new alliance chat message comes in?
column5:
1. Make sure Player A is in City View. 
2. Post a message into the Alliance Chat using Player B.
column6: Player A should receive a flashing animation as the new chat appears.
